name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Getaway.Direct: Find Direct Host Links for Airbnb Listings

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save $35/night on your next stay! Connect directly with property hosts

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Find the best deals on Airbnb and vacation rentals by connecting directly with property hosts. With getaway.direct, you skip the middleman fees and save on your bookings, effortlessly - 𝐟𝐨𝐫 𝐅𝐑𝐄𝐄

Want to travel smarter? Book your next stay directly through the host’s website—no more fees, just real savings. getaway.direct automatically finds direct links and social media profiles related to properties on AirBnB.

𝐇𝐨𝐰 𝐝𝐨𝐞𝐬 𝐠𝐞𝐭𝐚𝐰𝐚𝐲.𝐝𝐢𝐫𝐞𝐜𝐭 𝐰𝐨𝐫𝐤? 
1️⃣ Install the Chrome extension. 
2️⃣ Browse airbnb. 
3️⃣ getaway.direct scans listings in real-time, providing you with direct booking options and contact details.

𝐁𝐞𝐧𝐞𝐟𝐢𝐭𝐬 𝐨𝐟 𝐠𝐞𝐭𝐚𝐰𝐚𝐲.𝐝𝐢𝐫𝐞𝐜𝐭: 
🔅 Save on booking fees and secure the best rates
🔅 Connect with hosts directly

This Chrome extension helps you travel smarter by finding direct booking opportunities as you browse, reducing fees, and making it easier to connect with hosts personally. Download getaway.direct now and start saving! 

Works on all Chromium-based browsers: Google Chrome, Microsoft Edge, Opera, Brave, Arc, and more.
